TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
You see but not hear it. You feel it but not see it.

i wish to see, hear and feel a happy thought

224809302023

this page is new

Edited October 1, 2023 by AlamoVampire

Granted. You are proud of opening the 800th page.

I wish I did.

Edited October 1, 2023 by kerbiloid

Granted, you did... not.

I wish for some good meatloaf and mashed potatoes.

Granted you get a list of his music covered in mashed potatoes 

i wish you did

202010012023

Granted, however, this occurs in a sealed box with a radioactive isotope. If the isotope decays, the doing gets done. Unfortunately, you will never know whether or not the doing has been done since it cannot be observed. 

I wish that was less confusing.

Granted. Its Schrödingers particle.

i wish it was was where were was when it was was but how

222810012023

Granted. You see the Dao.

4 hours ago, TwoCalories said:

I wish for some good meatloaf and mashed potatoes.

Granted. You put a landmine in your kitchengarden, when a pig comes to eat potatoes.

***

I wish to read the downloaded books.

Granted: Every page flashes in front of you for 1 second. It is up to you to workout what you saw.

I wish to say mnemonic.

You order a VHS with Johnny Mnemonic.
As a bonus, you start knowing kung-fu and hacking computers with it.

(wrong thread)
I wish to rewatch all movies of my youth with fresh eyes.

Edited October 4, 2023 by kerbiloid

Granted, you get new fish eyes to watch those movies.

i wish someone would count vehicles with me.

024410042023

Granted. Vehicle 1, Vehicle 2, @AlamoVampire, Vehicle3, Vehicle 4, ...

I wish to process more data per second in my mind.

Granted your brain can process info as fast as the Saturn V navigation computers!

I wish I could post on the 800th page

Granted, you post on the 800th page of a contract that forces you to affirm the existence of Dres

I wish to wish you a wish incorruptible

004510062023

Granted: But nobody knows what it was.

I wish a simpler life.

Granted, you're a single cell organism.

I wish for a collaboration.

Edited October 7, 2023 by TwoCalories
spellind

(Thank you, that made life much simpler)

Granted: You play Number Wars.

I wish I understood more things.

Granted. You understand so many things it paralyzes you with understanding.

i wish i was

111410092023

Granted: You was once.

I wish I could have found an F-117 that had its number on it, to use on the counting by vehicles thread.

Granted. You've found it. Now you spend your days and nights in the government service office, explaining to them, why were you playing at the crash site.

I wish MicroProse was still alive and operating.

Granted. It is revived, but becomes micro sized,( like 1-3 people) and all the games suck.



I wish for Kerbin to be earth sized

Granted, but everything else stays the same, and the Mun collides with Kerbin and endlessly crashes your game, destroying your oldest save game and ruining your computer. Okay, that's kinda sad, but the wish is corrupted all the same, sooooo...

I wish for KSP1 but with the Interstellar OST in the background.

Granted. You have a tab open with the Interstellar OST playing, which uses so many system resources KSP constantly crashes.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             I wish every mod I wanted to use was up to date and worked with every other mod.

Granted: You put in the hard work to learn all aspects of designing a mod and go through every mod you want to use and correct everyting so that they all work seamlessly together.

I wish you do this to help all of us.

Granted. @Kerb24 does this to help us, and with good intentions, but it fails and corrupts all our PCs.

I wish for a bountiful trick-or-treating, since it is Halloween on the day of posting.

Granted.

Spoiler

Diathesis: the Halloween afterparty. Trick & Treat 2-in-1.

 

I wish for  Hello'Win.
